  • 22 Sep 2013 » NRefactory : Front-end parser for C#

    • NRefactroy is an open source library for parsing C# source codes, or more precisely a front-end parser for C#. It can parse your C# codes and provide you with an abstract syntax tree. It can also resolve this parse tree and give you semantic of nodes in the syntax tree.
